title: Analyse each others chat logs game
body:
Heya OCE summoners and other summoners :)

I remember a post where a rioter would post our recent chat logs and get the community to analyse and critique/give feedback on our behaviour :)

Is there a possibility to reintroduce this? Or is it already still a thing?

replies.body: Oh, God, someone do my logs. It'll be interesting 100%

> [{quoted}](name=Broken Scripts,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=wUhF0O7E,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2017-10-27T02:51:52.524+0000)
>
> Oh, God, someone do my logs. It'll be interesting 100%

For sure :D I wanna see how annoying I can be in game.

Ah, you're talking about this series:

https://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/player-behaviour/Lj5N4ZLb-want-some-tips-on-your-behaviour

I'm not sure where it's at right now. I can ask around!

> [{quoted}](name=Wuks,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=wUhF0O7E,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-10-24T10:40:17.893+0000)
>
> Ah, you're talking about this series:
> 
> https://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/player-behaviour/Lj5N4ZLb-want-some-tips-on-your-behaviour
> 
> I'm not sure where it's at right now. I can ask around!

please do !! I didn't get to ask for my chat logs to be critiqued :P
